name: Mary jean
description:
It was on Add a Settings section inside the admin panel that allows the administrator to change and manage the website logo.
The settings page must provide an upload option where the admin can:
upload a new logo image
preview the logo before saving
replace the current logo across the entire website
After saving, the system must automatically update and use the new logo in all logo locations, including:
the website header / navigation bar
login or admin screens
any branding areas where the logo appears
The uploaded logo must also be used as the favicon (browser tab icon).
Ensure the change is applied immediately and stored in the file-based storage so it remains after reloads or server restarts.
The feature must work smoothly, with proper validation, and without affecting any other part of the system.:
Add a Settings section inside the admin panel that allows the administrator to change and manage the website logo.
The settings page must provide an upload option where the admin can:
upload a new logo image
preview the logo before saving
replace the current logo across the entire website
After saving, the system must automatically update and use the new logo in all logo locations, including:
the website header / navigation bar
login or admin screens
any branding areas where the logo appears
The uploaded logo must also be used as the favicon (browser tab icon).
Ensure the change is applied immediately and stored in the file-based storage so it remains after reloads or server restarts.
The feature must work smoothly, with proper validation, and without affecting any other part of the system.
